Posts.Content: I will be having a sentinel node biopsy in 6 weeks.  I'm kind of nervous about it and don't really know what to expect.  I know it's a day procedure with anesthesia.  Is it the type of anesthesia you have with a colonoscopy or the type I will have when I have my mastectomy.  Any other advice? thanks!
Posts.Title: Pet Scan and Sentinel node biopsy
